Class RaytracerState

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--SimState
        |
        +--RaytracerState
public class RaytracerState
extends SimState

RaytracerState.java overrides component choices for sim card panel. overrides some messages. adds help and about messages.

Since:
JDK1.1.7A
Version:
99.3.1
Author:
Brian Maltzan
